org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.transactional

Class TxCollectionLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradoop.flink.model.impl.layouts.transactional.TxCollectionLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GraphCollectionLayout<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>, Layout<EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>

    public class TxCollectionLayout
extends Object
implements GraphCollectionLayout<EPGMGraphHead,EPGMVertex,EPGMEdge>
    Represents a GraphCollection with a single dataset. Each row in the dataset represents a single LogicalGraph with all its associated vertex and edge data.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMEdge> getEdges()
      Returns all edges.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMEdge> getEdgesByLabel(String label)
      Returns all edges having the specified label.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMGraphHead> getGraphHeads()
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMGraphHead> getGraphHeadsByLabel(String label)
      Returns the graph heads associated with the logical graphs in that collection filtered by label.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<GraphTransaction> getGraphTransactions()
      Returns the graph collection represented as graph transactions.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMVertex> getVertices()
      Returns all vertices.
      org.apache.flink.api.java.DataSet<EPGMVertex> getVerticesByLabel(String label)
      Returns all vertices having the specified label.
      boolean isGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on three separate datasets.
      boolean isIndexedGVELayout()
      True, if the layout is based on separate datasets separated by graph, vertex and edge labels.
      boolean isTransactionalLayout()
      True, if the layout is based on a transactional data representation.
